articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Thanks His Chinese Counterpart
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Thanks His Chinese Counterpart 

					 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Choe Yong Rim Friday sent a message of thanks to Premier of the State Council of China Wen Jiabao.
					
					 In the message Choe expressed thanks to the Chinese premier and comrades of the Chinese party and government and the fraternal Chinese people for their warm reception and cordial hospitality accorded to him during his visit to China. 
					
					 Expressing satisfaction over his successful visit to China, Choe expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger by concerted efforts of the two countries.
					
					 The message wished the Chinese people greater success in the drive to build a harmonious socialist society on the basis of the scientific outlook on development under the leadership of the Communist Party of China led by General Secretary Hu Jintao.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Guinea
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Guinea
						

					 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Sept. 29 sent a message of greeting to Alpha Conde, president of the Republic of Guinea, on the 53rd anniversary of its independence.
					
					 Expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop, Kim in the message heartily wished the president and the people of Guinea great successes in their work for national unity and socio-economic progress.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Cyprus
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cyprus
						

					 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Dimitris Christofias, president of the Republic of Cyprus, on the occasion of its independence day.
					
					 Kim in the message wished the people of Cyprus successes in their work for peaceful reunification and development of the country.
